description.original: Apply an image from various sources as a banner to your notes.
description.translation: Apply an image from various sources as a banner to your notes.

dict.Notice(\"Please enter an API key first\": Notice("Please enter an API key first")
dict.Notice(isValid ? \"\\u2705 Pexels API ke: Notice(isValid ? "\u2705 Pexels API key is valid!" : "\u274C Invalid Pexels API key")
dict.Notice(isValid ? \"\\u2705 Pixabay API k: Notice(isValid ? "\u2705 Pixabay API key is valid!" : "\u274C Invalid Pixabay API key")
dict.Notice(\"Pixabay API key is not set. Ple: Notice("Pixabay API key is not set. Please set it in the plugin settings.")
dict.Notice(\"Failed to fetch an image after: Notice("Failed to fetch an image after multiple attempts, try a different keyword and/or update the backup keyword list in settings.")
.log(`No image found for "${keyword}". Using image for "${currentKeyword}" instead.`)
dict..log(`No image found for the provided ke: .log(`No image found for the provided keyword: "${keyword}". Trying a random default keyword.`)
dict..error(\"No images found for any keyword: .error("No images found for any keywords, including the random default.")
dict.text: \"Optionally select which API prov: text: "Optionally select which API provider to use for fetching images. See the Examples tab for more information on referencing images by URL or local image. You can use any combination of API keyword, URL, or local image between notes."
dict.text: \"After each update you'll be prom: text: "After each update you'll be prompted with the release notes. You can disable this in the plugin settings General tab."
dict..setDesc(\"Apply banner only to direct c: .setDesc("Apply banner only to direct children of the folder")
dict..setDesc(\"Select the API provider for f: .setDesc("Select the API provider for fetching images")
dict..setDesc(\"Configure settings for images: .setDesc("Configure settings for images fetched from API. These settings apply when using keywords to fetch random images.")
dict..setDesc(\"Select the size of the image: .setDesc("Select the size of the image - (API only)")
dict..setDesc(\"Select the orientation of the: .setDesc("Select the orientation of the image - (API only)")
dict..setDesc(\"Enter the number of random im: .setDesc("Enter the number of random images to fetch (3-50) - (API only)")
dict..setDesc(\"Set how the banner image shou: .setDesc("Set how the banner image should be displayed")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the default height of the: .setDesc("Set the default height of the banner image (100-2500 pixels)")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the default fade effect f: .setDesc("Set the default fade effect for the banner image (-1500 to 100)")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the default border radius: .setDesc("Set the default border radius of the banner image (0-50 pixels)")
dict.text: \"Set default banner images for sp: text: "Set default banner images for specific folders. These will apply to all notes in the folder unless overridden by note-specific settings."
dict.Notice(isValid ? \"\\u2705 Flickr API ke: Notice(isValid ? "\u2705 Flickr API key is valid!" : "\u274C Invalid Flickr API key")
dict.Notice(isValid ? \"\\u2705 Unsplash API: Notice(isValid ? "\u2705 Unsplash API key is valid!" : "\u274C Invalid Unsplash API key")

dict.text: \"Enter your Pexels API key. Get y: text: "Enter your Pexels API key. Get your API key from "
dict.text: \"Enter your Pixabay API key. Get: text: "Enter your Pixabay API key. Get your API key from "
dict.text: \"Set the default vertical positio: text: "Set the default vertical position of the image, how it should be displayed, and where the content should start. These are global settings and apply to all notes with banners unless overridden by folder or note-specific settings."
dict.text: 'Set default banner images for spe: text: 'Set default banner images for specific folders. These will apply to all notes in the folder unless overridden by note-specific settings. To get started, add a folder image setting and click the "+ Add Folder Image Setting" button below.'
dict.text: \"Add the following fields to your: text: "Add the following fields to your note's frontmatter to customize the banner:"
dict.text: 'Note: The image display options a: text: 'Note: The image display options are "auto", "cover", or "contain". The image repeat option is only applicable when the display is set to "contain".'
dict..setText(\"Choose Folder to save Pinned: .setText("Choose Folder to save Pinned Banner Image")
dict..setDesc(\"Show a pin icon on random ban: .setDesc("Show a pin icon on random banner images that allows saving them to your vault. Once pinned, your frontmatter will be updated to use the local image instead of the API image.")
dict..setDesc(\"Default folder where pinned b: .setDesc("Default folder where pinned banner images will be saved")
dict..setDesc(\"Show a refresh icon next to t: .setDesc("Show a refresh icon next to the pin icon to get a new random image")
dict..setDesc(\"Enter a comma-separated list: .setDesc("Enter a comma-separated list of default keywords to be used when no keyword is provided in the frontmatter, or when the provided keyword does not return any results. - (API only)")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the vertical position of: .setDesc("Set the vertical position of the image (0-100)")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the default vertical posi: .setDesc("Set the default vertical position where the content starts (in pixels)")
dict..setPlaceholder(\"Select or type folder: .setPlaceholder("Select or type folder path to save Pinned Banner Image")
dict..setTooltip(\"Remove pinned images from: .setTooltip("Remove pinned images from the default folder that are no longer referenced in Notes")
dict.text: 'Customize the frontmatter field n: text: 'Customize the frontmatter field names used for the banner and Y-position. You can define multiple names for each field, separated by commas. Field names can only contain letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores. Example: "banner, pixel-banner, header_image" could all be used as the banner field name.'

dict.desc: \"Set custom field names for the Y: desc: "Set custom field names for the Y-position in frontmatter (comma-separated)"

desc: "Set custom field names for the image repeat in frontmatter (comma-separated)"
